BuildVertexBuffer
extern void BuildVertexBuffer(
IRenderer* pRenderer,
IShaderInfo* pShaderInfo,
std::vector<CGeomVertex>& pts,
MeshData* pMeshData
)

Internal function used to create a vertex buffer from a list of vertices

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

The renderer

pShaderInfo
IShaderInfo*

Information about the shader (need to get the vertex declaration)

pts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

pMeshData
MeshData*

created vertex buffer is stored in this structure
